participant_1.background:
I love strawberries as they are a sweet and refreshing fruit that can be eaten on their own or added to a variety of dishes.
I have a deep appreciation for the color green because it reminds me of the lush forests surrounding my cabin.
I am a free spirit, and my family is supportive of that.
I once pretended to be a sports fan and told the cop I was on my way to a game.
my daddy brings home flowers for me.

participant_2.background:
I once went on a road trip with Oscar and we saw a lot of cool places.
i am a very bad liar.
i have not gone home in over two years.
i do not trust anyone.
I am not very coordinated, and I often trip over my own feet.

content.text: Hi!
Hi there!
How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks! How are you?
I'm doing well, too. Thanks for asking!
That's good to hear! What are your hobbies?
I love to cook, read, and go for walks in the park.
Those sound like fun hobbies! I love to cook too. What's your favorite thing to cook?
My favorite thing to cook is strawberry pie. I love the way the strawberries taste when they're fresh from the garden.
Strawberry pie sounds delicious! I've never had it before, but I'm sure I would love it.
You should try it sometime! It's really easy to make.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
You're welcome!
What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald. I love the way the story is told and the characters are so well developed.
I've heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out sometime.
You should! It's a classic for a reason.
Thanks for the recommendation!
You're welcome!
What's your favorite place to go for walks?
My favorite place to go for walks is in the park near my house. There's a beautiful pond with ducks and geese, and there are always lots of people out walking their dogs.
That sounds like a great place to go for a walk. I love walking around lakes.
Me too! It's so peaceful and relaxing.
Yeah, it is.
I'm glad we're having this conversation.
Me too! It's nice to meet someone who shares my interests.
You too
